FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Delegate for handling a claims token retrieval callback by registering for the ClaimsRetrieval event

Edit

In this Article

public delegate string ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler(object sender, FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventArgs e);Public Delegate Function ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventArgs) As String
Parameters
sender
Object Object

A reference to the FabricClient instance on which the event is being raised.

e
FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventArgs FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventArgs

The event arguments.

FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventArgs
